DocAttribute.Name: BenchmarkValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: A list of any benchmark values used for comparison purposes.

DocAttribute.Name: ResultValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: A list of any resultant values used for comparison purposes.

DocAttribute.Name: ObjectiveQualifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that qualifies the type of objective constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedQualifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: A user defined value that qualifies the type of objective constraint when ObjectiveQualifier attribute of type _IfcObjectiveEnum_ has value USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedQualifier must be asserted when the value of the IfcObjectiveEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
